channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.11
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.11

item.title: CVE-2022-4318|2024-08-03T01:34:50.124Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openshift%20container%20platform%204.11
item.description: A vulnerability was found in cri-o. This issue allows the addition of arbitrary lines into /etc/passwd by use of a specially crafted environment variable.

item.title: CVE-2023-6596|2024-05-01T20:21:41.604Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20openshift%20container%20platform%204.11
item.description: An incomplete fix was shipped for the Rapid Reset (CVE-2023-44487/CVE-2023-39325) vulnerability for an OpenShift Containers.
